Review_title: The dullest film about sharks ever
Review_Text: Growing up on BBC wildlife documentary's raises the bar pretty high. But to any standard, this is just a complete waste of resources.We do not get any new information, and the old ones we get, we get 10 times at least. While the presentation is just boring every time.The attempts to get different points of view about sharks in Cape Cod is so sweaty you can smell it in your couch.There is absolutely no sign anybody thought of a plot, or a screenplay, they apparently just shot a lot of material, and glued it together.Even my 9 and 11 year old kids wandered away from the tv, which is the first in history.
